Package ca.mcgill.ecse458.tcpserver.repository

Class RobotRepository

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.ecse458.tcpserver.repository.RobotRepository
@Component public class RobotRepository extends Object

Repository that stores references to every robot thread using an ID:Thread mapping in a HashMap. Two RobotThreads may not be mapped to the same ID.

The contents of the HashMap are modified using synchronized methods for thread-safety.

Author:
Ze Yuan Fu
See Also:
  • ca.mcgill.ecse458.tcpserver.robot.RobotThread

    • getRobotById

      public RobotThread getRobotById(int id)
      Returns the RobotThread associated with the given ID, or null if no RobotThread exists for the given ID
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the robot thread to retrieve
      Returns:
      RobotThread with the given ID, or null if no RobotThread exists for the given ID

    • addRobotById

      public boolean addRobotById(int id, RobotThread robotThread)
      Adds the given RobotThread to the repository if the given ID is not already mapped to a RobotThread
      Parameters:
      id - ID to map the new RobotThread to
      robotThread - RobotThread to add to the repository
      Returns:
      True if the operation succeeded (repository does not contain a RobotThread with the given ID), false otherwise

    • updateRobotId

      public boolean updateRobotId(int oldId, int newId)
      Updates the ID of a RobotThread to the given new ID if the new ID is not already mapped to a RobotThread
      Parameters:
      oldId - ID of the RobotThread whose ID is updated
      newId - ID to update the RobotThread with
      Returns:
      True if the operation succeeded (repository does not contain a RobotThread with the given new ID), false otherwise

    • deleteRobotById

      public boolean deleteRobotById(int id)
      Deletes the RobotThread with the given ID if the mapping exists
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the RobotThread to delete
      Returns:
      True if the operation succeeded (repository contains a RobotThread with the given ID), false otherwise
